about_the_game:
Deep in the darkest shadows of the festival a strange fairground awaits, where people are masked and the mirrors reflect hidden secrets. There, among the carousels and blinking lights, two new characters are found. Emeli and Bronja.

Will you find out about their secrets or learn more about your own?

This DLC also includes a digital manual combined with a guide book, full with neat stuffs, like all the character paths, a guide to Remmy's dialogues, charts, a bit of background for the characters and other cool things. You'll also get a bit of Design Docs. A digital book filled with design notes from the making of Where the Music Dies and some reflections from the creator.


---------------------------------------------------------

  • Two new supporting characters.
  • Several weird new people to interact with.
  • A dark twisted new area to explore.
  • Strange new meetings among the mirrors.
  • A few more endings.
  • A cool digital manual.


---------------------------------------------------------

Where to find the manuals:

1. Right click on "Where the Music Dies" in the games list in your Steam library.
2. Select "Properties."
3. In the "Local Files" tab, select "Browse Local Files."
4. You'll find all the dlc stuff in the "Guide and extras" folder. Have fun!

content_descriptors.notes: A large focus on the story is the aftermath of a suicide and how characters handle the loss of a friend that made the choice to end their own life.
